name: ACE-360
desc: The top model of compact and affordable e-Drum kit, upgraded with a independent hihat, larger floor tom and extra crash cymbal.

features.name: Powerful Sound System
points: ACE-5202 Module: Latest sound module with built-in Bluetooth for easy wireless connection.
918 Sounds, 52+20 Drum Kits: A variety of sounds for any style, perfect for recording and live shows.
Enhanced Sampling: Multi-layered sampling captures left and right hand dynamics, preserving snare resonance and simulating real drum acoustics for a lifelike feel.

features.name: 12’’ 2 pieces independent Hihat
features.desc: Dual-plate design for authentic playing. Offers natural rebound and realistic swing, mimicking acoustic hi-hats. Supports traditional techniques perfectly.

features.name: Natural Feel with Dual-Layer Mesh and Multi-Zone Design
points: Three-Zone Snare: Detects Head, Rim, and Rimshot hits, adding depth and variety to your performance.
Dual-Zone Toms: Supports Head and Rim strikes for a more responsive, dynamic feel.
Adjustable Tension Mesh: Dual-layer mesh gives a realistic rebound and allows tension adjustments to suit your personal playing style.

features.name: Accurate Multi-Sensor Technology
features.desc: High-quality sensors capture each hit with precision, from gentle taps to hard strikes, giving you realistic dynamic feedback to elevate your performance.

features.name: Durable Kevlar Kick Drum
features.desc: Made from tough Kevlar, the kick drum passed a 22,000,000-hit endurance test without damage, ensuring it stays reliable even under intense use. Enjoy solid feedback for a genuine, lasting playing experience.

features.name: Easy MIDI and USB Connections
features.desc: MIDI and USB support; just one USB cable sends audio and MIDI data straight to your music software, making ACE-360 a great choice for home studios and live performances.

features.name: Quick Setup with Stable Stand Design
features.desc: Easy to set up with a stable, durable stand that’s ready for any performance, giving you a solid foundation to play on.

widgets.name: Kick Pad
widgets.desc: BD-05-KL x1 (5-inch) Kevlar Fiber with multi-layer cushion

widgets.name: Crash Cymbal 1
widgets.desc: CSH-08-SL x1(12-inch) Silicone 2-zone pad with choke

widgets.name: Ride Cymbal
widgets.desc: CSH-08-SL x1(12-inch) Silicone 2-zone pad with choke
